attributes.action: impose a quota of permits for eastern europeans
attributes.additional_details:
UK government must impose a quota of permits for A8(countries joined EU in 2004,Czech,Slovakia Hungry especially Poland...)as Switzerland imposed and has an economy better than most others on the continent.
Raising concerns over issues of integration and compliance with minimum wage and working conditions because of too many eastern European immigrants especially from Poland,Czech,Slovakia,Lithuania and Hungry.
